Projects

  • 1. Pokedex Project

    The Pokedex project is an innovative and comprehensive web application designed to serve as an all-in-one reference tool for Pokemon enthusiasts. Inspired by the iconic Pokedex device from the Pokemon series, this project aims to provide users with a user-friendly interface to explore detailed information about various Pokemon species.
    Technologies Used: Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js Backend: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB APIs: Pokemon API (for fetching Pokemon data), Authentication API (for user authentication)

  • 2. Learning Management System

    The LMS project is a comprehensive learning management system designed to facilitate seamless education management for institutions and individuals. Packed with advanced features, our LMS offers a robust platform for educators to deliver engaging courses and for learners to access high-quality educational content.
    Key Features: Course Management,Subscription Module,Payment Module,User Management,Admin Dashboard,Email Notifications,Responsive User Interface
    Technologies Used: Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js Backend: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB Authentication and Authorization: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) Email Functionality: Nodemailer
